en: 1795 Mar.13, Nashville [Territory South of the Ohio River, to] David Henley, Knoxville [Territory South of the Ohio River] / James Robertson

This is a letter to David Henley from James Robertson, dated March 13, 1795. Robertson informs Henley of a split between the Creek and Chickasaw Nations. Chickasaw Chief Pio Mingo has asked for assistance. Robertson approves of the idea to build a fort upon the Tennessee River.
Territory of the United States, South of the River Ohio
